verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1121>people<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%> who <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> of the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

<S%H834>These<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H3091>Jeshua,<s%> <S%H5166>Nehemiah,<s%> <S%H8304>Seraiah,<s%> <S%H7480>Reelaiah,<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> <S%H1114>Bilshan,<s%> <S%H4558>Mispar,<s%> <S%H902>Bigvai,<s%> <S%H7348>Rehum,<s%> and <S%H1196>Baanah.<s%> The <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Pahath-moab of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3091>Jeshua<s%> [and] <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> 2812;
The <S%H3548>priests:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3091>Jeshua,<s%> 973;
The <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3091>Jeshua<s%> and <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1938>Hodaviah,<s%> <S%H7657>74.<s%> <S%H702><s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H7778>gatekeepers:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H333>Ater,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2410>Hatita,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7630>Shobai,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> 139.
The <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6727>Ziha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2817>Hasupha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2884>Tabbaoth,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7026>Keros,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5517>Siaha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6303>Padon,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3838>Lebanah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H9117>Hagabah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2285>Hagab,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8014>Shalmai,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1515>Gahar,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7211>Reaiah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1502>Gazzam,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1153>Besai,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H619>Asnah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4586>Meunim,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5304>Nephisim,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1227>Bakbuk,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2709>Hakupha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2744>Harhur,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1213>Bazluth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4240>Mehida,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2797>Harsha,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1302>Barkos,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8547>Temah,<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Solomon's <S%H5650>servants:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5479>Sotai,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5618>Hassophereth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6514>Peruda,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3279>Jaalah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1874>Darkon,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2411>Hattil,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Pochereth-hazzebaim, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H532>Ami.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Solomon's <S%H5650>servants,<s%> were 392.

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are those who <S%H5927>came<s%> up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, <S%H3743>Cherub,<s%> <S%H135>Addan,<s%> [and] <S%H564>Immer,<s%> but they were not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5046>give<s%> <S%H5046>evidence<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> and their <S%H2233>descendants,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> they were of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda,<s%> 652.

And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2252>Habaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6976>Hakkoz,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> from the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite,<s%> and he was <S%H7121>called<s%> by their <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1245>searched<s%> [among] their <S%H3187>ancestral<s%> <S%H3791>registration,<s%> <S%H3187><s%> but they could not be <S%H4672>located;<s%> therefore they were considered <S%H1351>unclean<s%> [and excluded] from the <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%>

And the <S%H8660>governor<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them that they should not <S%H398>eat<s%> from the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> up with <S%H224>Urim<s%> and <S%H8550>Thummim.<s%>

<S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> their <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H519><s%> <S%H428>who<s%> numbered 7337; and they had 200 <S%H7891>singing<s%> men and women.

And <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households,] when they <S%H935>arrived<s%> at the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H5068>offered<s%> <S%H5068>willingly<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H5975>restore<s%> it on its <S%H4349>foundation.<s%>

According to their <S%H3581>ability<s%> they <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H214>treasury<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> 61000 <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1871>drachmas,<s%> and 5000 <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4488>minas,<s%> and 100 <S%H3548>priestly<s%> <S%H3801>garments.<s%>

Now the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> the <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> and the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
